mapper.select: select f.faq_no, f.titl, f.conts, f.qctg_no, qc.name from faq f left outer join question_category qc on f.qctg_no = qc.qctg_no order by f.qctg_no asc;
select distinct qc.qctg_no, qc.name from faq f right outer join question_category qc on f.qctg_no = qc.qctg_no order by qc.qctg_no asc;
select f.faq_no, f.titl, f.conts, f.qctg_no, qc.name from faq f left outer join question_category qc on f.qctg_no = qc.qctg_no where faq_no = #{value};
mapper.insert: insert into faq(qctg_no, titl, conts) values(#{qcNo}, #{title}, #{contents})
mapper.update: update faq set qctg_no = #{qcNo}, titl = #{title}, conts = #{contents} where faq_no = #{no};
